Table with column names
=======================

===  ===  =====
One  Two  Three
===  ===  =====
1    2    3
a    b    c
===  ===  =====

Table without column names
==========================

===  ===  =====
One  Two  Three
1    2    3
a    b    c
===  ===  =====

Edge case
=========

=  =  =
1  2  3
a  b  c
=  =  =
